name: Panic Button (thetotemguy)
description:
Panic Button

Hotline Miami inspired top-down shooter set in a bank

Entry to: Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Things get chaotic during a poorly planned bank heist

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse 0 - Shoot
  • Mouse 1, E, Space Bar - Interact
  • R - Restart
  • N - Skip Introduction
  • F - Flash Light

Terrible jump from day to night but I wanted to mess about with the experimental 2D Lights and Shadows

Disclaimer: I have never beaten wave four, but good luck!
